sources.title: Procore's Statement Regarding Oracle Lawsuit
sources.snippet: Procore was founded 22 years ago with a simple vision: to improve the lives of everyone in construction. sources.title: Oracle sues Procore, accusing rival of trade secret theft
sources.snippet: Software giant Oracle has initiated legal action against construction industry software firm Procore Technologies , alleging the latter of misappropriating confidential information to fuel its business growth..
